bug.author: JohnSnowball
bug.description:
Hi I got a problem when executing build.cmd. Using Vs 2017 community, while building, it shows: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18409502/45077327-7633aa00-b11f-11e8-9292-e975f685fd0c.PNG></denchmark-link>
From double to const float error.I tried to modify the source code however it doesn't work. Could anyone tell me how to fix it?

comments.comment: It's interesting that only you have encountered this so far :). I've added a fix.
